price: Wͻn a sε wͻrehyε (biribi te sε kookoo anaa aburoo anaa nkyene anaa εmoo) afri (obi hͻ a) wͻhyε ma εyε ma;
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ إِذَا ٱكۡتَالُواْ عَلَى ٱلنَّاسِ يَسۡتَوۡفُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: alladhīna idhā ik'tālū ʿalā al-nāsi yastawfūna
